languages.text: "Есть... еще одна причина, Ваша Светлость. Боюсь, она покажется вам смехотворной. Видите ли, я всегда знал, что моя судьба ждет меня на флагмане. Ибо с детства мне снится один и тот же сон: темноволосая девушка ступает по палубам босыми ногами, а я ступаю за ней. Бегу, но никак не могу догнать".

traits.locale_text: "Есть... еще одна причина, Ваша Светлость. Боюсь, она покажется вам смехотворной. Видите ли, я всегда знал, что моя судьба ждет меня на флагмане. Ибо с детства мне снится один и тот же сон: темноволосая девушка ступает по палубам босыми ногами, а я ступаю за ней. Бегу, но никак не могу догнать".

languages.text: "There is... another reason, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but I am afraid you will find it laughable. You see, I have always known my destiny awaits me on the flagship. Because ever since I was a child, I've had the same dream over and over: a dark-haired young woman walking barefoot along the decks, and me following in her footsteps. I would run but could never catch up to her."
languages.original_text: "Есть... еще одна причина, Ваша Светлость. Боюсь, она покажется вам смехотворной. Видите ли, я всегда знал, что моя судьба ждет меня на флагмане. Ибо с детства мне снится один и тот же сон: темноволосая девушка ступает по палубам босыми ногами, а я ступаю за ней. Бегу, но никак не могу догнать".

That is because ever since I was a child, I've had the same dream: of a dark-haired young woman walking barefoot along decks, and me following in her footsteps. I would run but never catch up to her."

"There is... another reason, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I am afraid you are going to find it laughable. You see, I have always known my destiny awaits me on the flagship. That is because ever since I was a child, I've had the same dream: of a dark-haired young woman walking barefoot along decks, and me following in her footsteps. I would run but never catch up to her."

I would run but could never catch up to her."

Because ever since I was a child, I've had the same dream over and over: a dark-haired young woman walking barefoot along the decks, and me following in her footsteps. I would run but could never catch up to her."

"There is... another reason, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but I am afraid you will find it laughable. You see, I have always known my destiny awaits me on the flagship. Because ever since I was a child, I've had the same dream over and over: a dark-haired young woman walking barefoot along the decks, and me following in her footsteps. I would run but could never catch up to her."

languages.text: « Ce... ne sont pas les seules raisons, Votre Seigneurie, mais j'ai peur que vous vous moquiez. J'ai toujours su que mon destin était de servir sur ce vaisseau. D'aussi loin que je me souvienne, j'ai toujours fait le même rêve : une jeune femme brune marchant pieds nus sur les passerelles, et moi dans son sillage, à courir sans jamais pouvoir la rattraper. »
languages.original_text: "There is... another reason, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but I am afraid you will find it laughable. You see, I have always known my destiny awaits me on the flagship. Because ever since I was a child, I've had the same dream over and over: a dark-haired young woman walking barefoot along the decks, and me following in her footsteps. I would run but could never catch up to her."

traits.locale_text: « Ce... ne sont pas les seules raisons, Votre Seigneurie, mais j'ai peur que vous vous moquiez. J'ai toujours su que mon destin était de servir sur ce vaisseau. D'aussi loin que je me souvienne, j'ai toujours fait le même rêve : une jeune femme brune marchant pieds nus sur les passerelles, et moi dans son sillage, à courir sans jamais pouvoir la rattraper. »

languages.text: «Hay... otro motivo más, mi{mf|lord|lady}, aunque me temo que le parecerá irrisorio. Siempre he sabido que mi destino me espera en la nave insignia. Desde que era niño, he tenido el mismo sueño una y otra vez: una mujer de pelo oscuro camina descalza por las cubiertas y yo sigo sus pasos. Pero, por mucho que corra, no logro alcanzarla».
languages.original_text: "There is... another reason, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but I am afraid you will find it laughable. You see, I have always known my destiny awaits me on the flagship. Because ever since I was a child, I've had the same dream over and over: a dark-haired young woman walking barefoot along the decks, and me following in her footsteps. I would run but could never catch up to her."

traits.locale_text: «Hay... otro motivo más, mi{mf|lord|lady}, aunque me temo que le parecerá irrisorio. Siempre he sabido que mi destino me espera en la nave insignia. Desde que era niño, he tenido el mismo sueño una y otra vez: una mujer de pelo oscuro camina descalza por las cubiertas y yo sigo sus pasos. Pero, por mucho que corra, no logro alcanzarla».

languages.text: 「それと…他にも理由があるのです、陛下。バカだと思われる話かも知れませんが…私はずっと、旗艦にこそ自分の運命が待っていると感じていました。子供の頃から、何度も何度も同じ夢を見るのです。黒髪の若い女性がデッキを裸足で歩いていて、私がその足跡をたどる。走っても走っても、彼女に追いつくことはできないのです」
languages.original_text: "There is... another reason, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but I am afraid you will find it laughable. You see, I have always known my destiny awaits me on the flagship. Because ever since I was a child, I've had the same dream over and over: a dark-haired young woman walking barefoot along the decks, and me following in her footsteps. I would run but could never catch up to her."

traits.locale_text: 「それと…他にも理由があるのです、陛下。バカだと思われる話かも知れませんが…私はずっと、旗艦にこそ自分の運命が待っていると感じていました。子供の頃から、何度も何度も同じ夢を見るのです。黒髪の若い女性がデッキを裸足で歩いていて、私がその足跡をたどる。走っても走っても、彼女に追いつくことはできないのです」

languages.text: “其实……还有另一个原因，说起来或许挺可笑的，大人。老实说，我一直坚信我的命运就在这艘旗舰上等着我。因为我还是个孩子的时候起，我就一遍又一遍地做着同样的梦——有个满头黑发的年轻女人光着脚，在甲板上走着，而我在跟随她的脚步。我跑了起来，但无论如何都追不上她。”
languages.original_text: "There is... another reason, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but I am afraid you will find it laughable. You see, I have always known my destiny awaits me on the flagship. Because ever since I was a child, I've had the same dream over and over: a dark-haired young woman walking barefoot along the decks, and me following in her footsteps. I would run but could never catch up to her."

traits.locale_text: “其实……还有另一个原因，说起来或许挺可笑的，大人。老实说，我一直坚信我的命运就在这艘旗舰上等着我。因为我还是个孩子的时候起，我就一遍又一遍地做着同样的梦——有个满头黑发的年轻女人光着脚，在甲板上走着，而我在跟随她的脚步。我跑了起来，但无论如何都追不上她。”

languages.text: "Es gibt ... noch einen Grund, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ich fürchte, Ihr könntet ihn lachhaft finden. Ich habe nämlich immer gewusst, dass meine Bestimmung mich auf dem Flaggschiff erwartet. Schon seit meiner Kindheit habe ich wieder und wieder denselben Traum: eine dunkelhaarige junge Frau, die barfuß über die Decks spaziert, während ich ihr stets folge. Ich laufe, um sie einzuholen, schaffe es aber nie."
languages.original_text: "There is... another reason, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but I am afraid you will find it laughable. You see, I have always known my destiny awaits me on the flagship. Because ever since I was a child, I've had the same dream over and over: a dark-haired young woman walking barefoot along the decks, and me following in her footsteps. I would run but could never catch up to her."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt ... noch einen Grund, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber ich fürchte, Ihr könntet ihn lachhaft finden. Ich habe nämlich immer gewusst, dass meine Bestimmung mich auf dem Flaggschiff erwartet. Schon seit meiner Kindheit habe ich wieder und wieder denselben Traum: eine dunkelhaarige junge Frau, die barfuß über die Decks spaziert, während ich ihr stets folge. Ich laufe, um sie einzuholen, schaffe es aber nie."

languages.text: "Başka bir... Nedeni daha var {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ancak korkarım ki bunu gülünç bulacaksınız. Şöyle ki her daim kaderimin beni sancak gemisinde beklediğinin farkındaydım. Çünkü çocukluğumdan beri devamlı aynı rüyayı görüyordum. Siyah saçlı genç bir kadın, güvertelerde çıplak ayakla yürürdü. Ben de onun adımlarını takip ederdim. Koşsam da onu asla yakalayamazdım."
languages.original_text: "There is... another reason, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but I am afraid you will find it laughable. You see, I have always known my destiny awaits me on the flagship. Because ever since I was a child, I've had the same dream over and over: a dark-haired young woman walking barefoot along the decks, and me following in her footsteps. I would run but could never catch up to her."
